# Generated by generate_HeadersTest.sh
# prefix: kproperty
# link_libs: KProperty
# subdirs: kproperty editors/kproperty
#
# WARNING! All changes made in this file will be lost!
#
# Test if all the installed headers can be included individually.
# This is a compile-time test.
#

add_custom_target(headers_test echo "headers_test: Creating HeadersTest files in ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} with builddir=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}, prefix=kproperty, linking to libs [KProperty], searching in subdirs [kproperty editors/kproperty]...")

add_custom_command(
    TARGET headers_test
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/generate_HeadersTest.sh ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR} KProperty kproperty kproperty editors/kproperty
    WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)

add_executable(
    HeadersTest
    HeadersTest.cpp
    BoolEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    ColorEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    ComboBox_HeaderTest.cpp
    CursorEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    DateEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    DateTimeEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    FontEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    KProperty_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyEditorDataModel_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyEditorView_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyFactory_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertySet_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyStringEditor_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyUtils_HeaderTest.cpp
    LineStyleEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    PixmapEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    PointEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    RectEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    SizeEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    SizePolicyEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    SpinBox_HeaderTest.cpp
    TimeEdit_HeaderTest.cpp
    Utils_HeaderTest.cpp
    kproperty_export.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    kproperty_version.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    config-kproperty.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    booledit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    coloredit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    combobox.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    cursoredit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    dateedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    datetimeedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    fontedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyEditorDataModel.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyEditorView.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyFactory.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KProperty.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertySet.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyStringEditor.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    KPropertyUtils.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    linestyleedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    pixmapedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    pointedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    rectedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    sizeedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    sizepolicyedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    spinbox.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    timeedit.h_HeaderTest.cpp
    utils.h_HeaderTest.cpp
)

target_link_libraries(
  HeadersTest
  KProperty
)
